h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Head up the path where you'll find one more Red-Haired Yaksha patrolling, and lure him away from the enemies at the end of the path to take him on alone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Head up the path where you'll find one more Red-Haired Yaksha patrolling, and lure him away from the enemies at the end of the path to take him on alone.
